summary: Mining is much shorter now! You will strike veins only 3 times instead of 9 but get all ores/gems out of it!
descriptionHtml:
Mining is much shorter now! You will strike veins only 3 times instead of 9 but get all ores/gems out of it!

Installation:
Extract archive into Skyrim main directory (default: \"C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\") and merge folders when questioned

OR
Use NMM



WARNING: The steam workshop version of this mod didn\'t work so it\'s just a test
author: Ebald
